question: NHL: Will the Lightning beat the Bruins by more than 1.5 goals in their April 8 matchup (7 PM ET)?

question: Formula 1: Who will finish ahead at the 2022 Australian Grand Prix: Max Verstappen or Charles Leclerc?
description:
This is a market on the higher placed finisher at the 2022 Australian Grand Prix, Max Verstappen or Charles Leclerc. The race takes place at the 5.278-kilometre Melbourne Grand Prix Circuit on Sunday, April 10, 2022.

The market will resolve to “Max Verstappen” if Max Verstappen finishes ahead of Charles Leclerc, and “Charles Leclerc” if Charles Leclerc finishes ahead of Max Verstappen. 

Note:
- If Max Verstappen finishes the race but Charles Leclerc does not, or does not compete at all, the market will resolve to “Max Verstappen”. 
- If Charles Leclerc finishes the race but Max Verstappen does not, or does not compete at all, the market will resolve to “Charles Leclerc”. 
- If neither Charles Leclerc nor Max Verstappen finish the race before April 17 (11 PM ET), then the market will resolve to 50-50. 
- If for any reason the Australian Grand Prix is rescheduled to a date on or before April 17, 2022, the same market conditions will apply.
